definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to come from (a place)/From: (in email header)

(after a verb) indicating the beginning and continuation of an action or a state/indicating an upward movement (e.g. after 站[zhan4])/indicating completion/(after a perception verb, e.g. 看[kan4]) expressing preliminary judgment/also pr. [qi3 lai5]
to stand up/to get up/also pr. [qi3 lai2]

(after a verb) indicating the beginning and continuation of an action or a state/indicating an upward movement (e.g. after 站[zhan4])/indicating completion/(after a perception verb, e.g. 看[kan4]) expressing preliminary judgment/also pr. [qi3 lai5]
to stand up/to get up/also pr. [qi3 lai2]
(after a verb, indicates coming out, completion of an action, or ability to discern or detect)
(after a verb, indicates coming out, completion of an action, or ability to discern or detect)
original/former/originally/formerly/at first/so, actually, as it turns out

to come down/(completed action marker)/(after verb of motion, indicates motion down and towards us, also fig.)/(indicates continuation from the past towards us)/to be harvested (of crops)/to be over (of a period of time)/to go among the masses (said of leaders)

sentences.english: I just came from a fruit market.
sentences.chinese: 我剛從一個水果市場來。

sentences.english: McDonald's and KFC use this kind of international business strategy to make their profit.
sentences.chinese: 麥當勞和肯得及就是利用這種國際化策略來盈利的。

sentences.english: You know, Uncle Brendan, I am really glad you invited me here.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，布萊登叔叔，我真的很高興你邀請我們來。

sentences.english: I'm using exactly the same form to reduce this.
sentences.chinese: 我用的同樣的方法來減少問題的規模。

sentences.english: When I come to Shengzhou, I always stay there.
sentences.chinese: 我每次來嵊舟，都會待在那裏。

sentences.english: So, combustible ice is how come from?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，可燃冰是怎麼來的呢？

sentences.english: The script could be improved by displaying the picks in a Keno-style board.
sentences.chinese: 可以通過在基諾樣式板中顯示選擇結果來改進腳本。

sentences.english: Few drinks at the dinner will find us all snoozed at the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 晚飯來幾杯，過會紛紛睡倒在沙發上了。

sentences.english: Are you willing to return, escorted by me?
sentences.chinese: 你願意回去嗎，由我來護送？

sentences.english: National Day is coming, and we can have a seven day.
sentences.chinese: 國慶節來了，我有七天啲假期。

sentences.english: What I wear depends on the time of the day and thd places that I am going to.
sentences.chinese: 我的穿着是根據當天的時刻和我要去的地點來決定。

sentences.english: This will launch XCOR into the emerging space tourism market, estimated at over a half-billion dollars.
sentences.chinese: 公司將投資超過五億美金，來拓展空間旅遊市場。

sentences.english: China is transforming the world as it transforms itself.
sentences.chinese: 中國正在像轉變自身那樣來轉變世界。

sentences.english: Scuffing the ball, she says, disrupts the already turbulent external airflow.
sentences.chinese: 她說，將球進行打磨，來擾動不穩定的外部氣流。

sentences.english: The shipping charges for returning samples will be added to your final invoice.
sentences.chinese: 運費爲返回的樣品將增加來您最後的發貨票。

definition: from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
(after a verb, indicates coming out, completion of an action, or ability to discern or detect)
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
to come over/to manage/to handle/to be able to take care of
haven't/hasn't/doesn't exist/to not have/to not be
